# Community Housing Center and Special Needs Services
## Background
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) intends to award a contract for community housing center and special needs services to a pre-identified supplier. This notice allows other suppliers to express their interest by submitting a statement of capabilities.

## Objectives
The objectives of this contract are to provide:

*   Accommodation, monitoring, general support, and assistance to federal offenders released to the community on conditional release, statutory release, and those subject to long-term supervision orders
*   Residential services, security services, and ongoing liaison with local police agencies to assist conditionally released offenders in reintegrating into the community as law-abiding citizens

## Key Requirements
The following requirements must be met:

*   The contractor must have a minimum of two years of experience working with adult offenders on conditional release and providing accommodation to offenders in a residential setting
*   The contractor must be a non-profit organization or a corporation governed by a board of directors appointed from the community
*   The contractor must provide services in the official language (English or French) requested by the offender and include the translation costs of the report

## Security Requirements
The contract includes security requirements, including:

*   Holding a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
*   Obtaining approved Document Safeguarding Capability at the level of PROTECTED B
*   Ensuring contractor personnel requiring access to PROTECTED information, assets, or sensitive sites hold a valid Reliability Status

## Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation criteria for the statement of capabilities include:

*   Meeting the minimum essential requirements
*   Providing evidence of a minimum of two years of experience in working with adult offenders on conditional release
*   Demonstrating the ability to provide accommodation to offenders in a residential setting

## Tender Documentation
The tender documentation includes the following:

*   The statement of work
*   The evaluation criteria
*   The security requirements

## Procurement Details
The procurement details are as follows:

*   The tender closing date and time is March 29, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
*   Inquiries and statements of capabilities should be directed to Manon Paulin at the Correctional Service of Canada
